abstract: New York City's original area code, 212, is seen by many as status symbol; proliferation of cellphones has forced state regulators to prepare to add yet another area code for Manhattan, making numbers with the original 212 designation even harder to obtain; persistence of brokers who buy and sell 212 numbers is testament to fact that they are still seen by many as sign of being a true New Yorker.
lead_paragraph: New York City’s original area code remains in high demand, even as the proliferation of cellphones means Manhattan may get a fourth one by late 2017.

headline.main: Manhattan Area Codes Multiply, but the Original, 212, Is Still Coveted
headline.print_headline: As City Gains Area Codes, Still Coveting the Original

snippet: New York City’s original area code remains in high demand, even as the proliferation of cellphones means Manhattan may get a fourth one by late 2017.
